column4: can i burn a livecd image to a USB stick from Windows?  my linux machine is explodified so i need to fix that from a livecd
any way to do it without installing unetbootin?  kinda limited to non-admin access here atm
as far as I remember you don't have to install it
alrighty, i'll try that, i'll be back if it doesnt work :P
you can reset your windows password if it limits you :D
cant do that either, but not a bad idea xD
unetbootin requires admin privs to run on Windows
then why don't you reset admin password? :)
or you can burn a live cd and do it from there
i cant, i dont own the system :p
wish i had extra CDs or DVDs
irrelevant now, i found my 10.04 LiveUSB
but there are ways to do it without right
lemme make this clear: i dont own the system so i dont have legal rights to screw with the settings and passcodes
so drop the notion that I can, and leave it be
